text: Hanki Jotamu'a hige'za Ra Anumzamofo ra mono no kumapima ufre kahama, anagamu kazigama me'nea kahana tro hu'naze. Hianagi havi anumzante'ma mono'ma nehaza kumatamina eri havizana osu'nege'za, anantega vahe'mo'za vuvava hu'za ofa ome kresramna nevu'za mnanentake pauranena tevefi kremna vu'naze.
